Keep them outside as much as possible in the spring, summer. They like full sun, but partial shade is acceptable. If the leaves start to fade or look burnt, move the plant to a place where it gets morning sun and is shaded during the heat of the afternoon..</description> <due_date/> <escalation>0</escalation> <expected_start/> <follow_up/> <group_list/> <impact>3</impact> <knowledge>false</knowledge> <location/> <made_sla>true</made_sla> <maintenance_task>Temprature</maintenance_task> <number>TASK0024050</number> <opened_at>2024-10-19 13:09:01</opened_at> <opened_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</opened_by> <order/> <parent/> <plant display_value="Adenium plant">70a08e1e8315d210e2b2cbb6feaad3ae</plant> <priority>4</priority> <reassignment_count>0</reassignment_count> <rejection_goto/> <route_reason/> <service_offering/> <short_description>They like full sun</short_description> <sla_due/> <state>2</state> <sys_class_name>x_snc_plant_mgmt_tasks</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-10-19 13:10:01</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>b961c252835dd210e2b2cbb6feaad367</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-10-20 15:09:27</sys_updated_on> <task_effective_number>TASK0024050</task_effective_number> <time_worked/> <universal_request/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </x_snc_plant_mgmt_tasks> </record_update>
